title: Ep. 564 - How To Not Get Shot By The Cops
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, after a summer of rioting spurred by a handful of high profile police shootings, today I want to take a look at what we can actually learn from those cases. They seem to provide a blueprint for how to avoid getting killed or maimed by the police. It’s not as hard as you might think. Also Five Headlines including a federal judge shutting down the shut downs. And in our Daily Cancellation, I will cancel Joe Biden for claiming that you’ll die in a hurricane if Trump is reelected.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
